description:
Our place is on the same block of the subway, perfectly located in Hells Kitchen, steps away from all the action at Times Square. This neighborhood is one of the most fun in the city, close to many restaurants, bars and all the attractions New York has to offer. Grocery stores,  The Museum of Modern Art, Gotham West Market, shopping at fifith avenue are all at walking distance. Our place is good for couples and solo adventurers travelers!

We welcome open and direct communication via email and Airbnb messaging to ensure guests have the perfect stay!

We are very close to times square, theatre district and Hell's Kitchen restaurant and bars! The subway is a few steps away.

Subway is 200 meters away!

We are a second floor walk up, no elevetor.
name: QUIET ONE BED APT IN HELLS KITCHEN NEAR SUBWAY
review:
Very nice stay / estancia muy agradable.
We were 4 people traveling for pleasure. The appartment was very well located and comfortable enough to fit 4 people. We used the air matress instead of the couch for two of us, and it was very comfortable. Good quality/price rate for Manhattan.

éramos 4 personas en viaje de turismo. El apartamento está muy bien situado y suficientemente cómodo para 4 personas. Utilizamos el colchón hinchable en vez del sofá-cama para 2 y dormimos muy bien. Buena relación calidad-precio para lo que se encuentra en Manhattan
